Experience the next generation of home renovations with Remodel AI—an innovative application that empowers you to visualize and realize your ideal home transformations. With just a quick snapshot of any room, witness it evolve into a reimagined masterpiece.

Explore a variety of styles, colors, and furnishings to envision your dream space. Whether you're longing for a cozy rustic retreat or a sleek modern oasis - or even if you're curious about experiencing your room in the style of the upcoming holiday - our intuitive interface empowers you to bring your unique vision to life with ease.

 FEATURES:

       Capture room photos for remodeling

       Transform room design with AI technology.

       Experiment with various styles, colors, and furnishings.

       Seamlessly share remodelled designs with friends and professionals.

       Measure length, height, and areas in both directions.

       Auto-calculate perimeter, square footage, and ceiling height.
    
       Enhance floor plans with doors and windows.

       Capture and share measurements

       Store and organize measurement data.

       Export or share measurements.

If you're under the impression that this is merely another application that generates AI video or ordinary creator tool, then think again. "Creati" stands out from the rest, by multiply single creative template to infinite customized creatives using its element based video generation. No matter you are selling a shoe or a hamburger, simply upload your product to stunning AI templates, and you will get the viral hook in minutes!

HOW DOES IT WORK?

This is not simply a video generator. Creati builds the community of influencer and brands, and with all amazing creative templates from influencers, brands can easily create stunning visual effects by simply uploading their product and grab traffic on social media.


NO WORRY ABOUT PHOTO TAKING ANYMORE

If it's challenging for you to take good photos...
No longer worry about capturing the perfect shot on the first try. Creati can always save any 'bad shots' using its AI editing power, and transform a not-so-perfect moment into an Instagram masterpiece.
If you don't want to waste hours photoshopping your photos...
Say goodbye to the cliche photo editing apps or Photoshop. With Creati, there is no learning barrier for hundreds of editing tools. Fix your weird face, strange clothes or messy background just with one tap instantly.
If you feel you are one pro photo away from a great CV or dating app profile...
Creati can transform your normal photos to stunning professional shots or social media profile photos, even yearbook style in seconds. Stop spending thousands of dollars and hours waiting in the photo studio now.

SHINE ON SOCIAL MEDIA

Creati not only make it crazily simple to take perfect photos, where every moment is just right, it also make share-worthy viral content with your AI profile. or even try on different occupational roles with unique styles, from trendy hairstyles to professional attire. Imagine snapping photos in various locations like Antarctica, all from your phone. This feature not only transforms your appearance but also places you in thrilling scenes, perfect for stunning, Instagram-worthy shots.
You can experiment with different occupational roles, trying out unique styles from trendy hairstyles to professional attire. Just imagine capturing photos in diverse locations like Antarctica, all using your phone. This feature not only changes how you look, but also immerses you in exciting scenes, ideal for taking stunning shots that are Instagram-worthy.
Whether you're eager to alter your look or explore new professional personas, Creati has you covered. Picture yourself trying out distinctive styles, from trendy hairstyles to professional attire, even teleport yourself to Antarctic, just on your phone. This extraordinary capability not only changes your appearance but also transports you into thrilling scenes, enabling you to capture breathtaking shots that are truly Instagram-worthy.

One-tap wizard that crafts 'whoops photos' to perfection using personalized AI profile
Elevate your profile picture creation effortlessly.

Easily redesign your home in a variety of stunning styles using advanced AI technology.​​ Home AI brings the expertise of an interior designer right into your pocket!

Simply take or upload a photo of the room and space you wish to redesign, choose a style, and receive instant interior design alternatives with unparalleled detail and accuracy. 

Whether you aim to modernize your living room, add a touch of elegance to your bedroom, or completely revamp your kitchen, Home AI has got you covered.
Whether you're an existing homeowner looking for a fresh new look, or a real estate agent staging the perfect property, our app is your ideal design partner. Home AI is here to serve as your personal AI interior design assistant, transforming your space in real time and providing personalized interior designs tailored specifically for your space.

【Effortless Interior Design at Your Fingertips】

Instant Room Makeover: Take a picture of any room in your house, and Home AI's advanced AI technology will instantly generate stunning interior design concepts tailored to your space. Witness the magic unfold as your vision comes to life before your eyes, with every detail thoughtfully optimized.

A World of Interior Design Styles: Unleash your inner decorator with our extensive library of over 10 diverse interior design styles. From the sleek minimalism of modern interior design to the calming serenity of a zen aesthetic, Home AI caters to every taste. Experiment with various styles, mix and match elements, and discover the perfect look that reflects your unique personality.

AI-Powered Recommendations that Go Beyond Style: Home AI doesn't just suggest a new look; it provides insightful recommendations on furniture, decor, and color schemes that perfectly complement your chosen style. Create a harmonious and cohesive space that feels truly lived-in.

【More Than Just Visualization:】

Save and Share Your Concepts: Capture and store your favorite interior design concepts for future reference. Share your transformed spaces with friends, family, or even professional interior designers to gather valuable feedback and refine your vision. Collaborate effortlessly and bring your design dreams to life.

Find Inspiration from Endless Possibilities: Home AI acts as your personal interior design muse, offering endless inspiration to spark your creativity. Explore different concepts and experiment with various styles to find the perfect balance that reflects your unique taste and elevates your space.

【Home AI is the ultimate tool for anyone who wants to:】

Effortlessly visualize interior design ideas and see their dream home come to life
Explore a vast library of interior design styles and discover their perfect aesthetic
Refresh a single room or plan a complete home makeover with ease
Collaborate with friends, family, and professionals to create a personalized space
Spark their creativity and find endless interior design inspiration

Download Home AI today and unlock a world of interior design possibilities! Reimagine your space, redefine your style, and create the home of your dreams with the power of cutting-edge AI technology.

By using the app, you confirm that you acknowledge and accept our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
Privacy Policy: https://homeinterior.ai/privacy
Terms of Service: https://homeinterior.ai/terms

Do you have a question for us?
info@homeinterior.ai

Bring your dream design to life with just one photo!

Our app helps you instantly transform any space — whether it’s your room, garden, or house exterior. Just upload a photo, choose a style and color palette, and get a ready-to-use design idea in seconds.

Key features:

- Interior Design – upload your room photo, select the type of space, style, and colors to see how it could look.
- Exterior Design – redesign your house facade with one tap.
- Landscape Design – visualize your garden or yard in different styles.
- Virtual Furnishing – decorate your room with furniture and décor items to see how everything fits together.

Perfect for:
- Homeowners planning renovations
- Designers looking for inspiration
- Anyone dreaming of refreshing their space easily

Turn imagination into reality — start designing today!

Explore our enormous collection of stylish icons, themes, wallpapers, and widgets! You’re free to jazz up your phone’s Lock & Home Screens to your taste.


And it's not just about the look. With Themify widgets for Lock & Home screens and StandBy, you can keep the info you need handy, turn your phone into a smart display, and even have a digital pet right on your screen!


COMPLETE MAKEOVER of your device!

Themify gives you a wide range of tools to express yourself. With our app, you're free to customize your phone to your liking. Enjoy state-of-the-art content and unleash your creativity!

Whether you love dark hues or you’re a diehard pastel fan, you can decorate your screen to create a harmonious space! Install a theme that suits your taste, and watch your app icons, widgets, and wallpapers come together seamlessly.

ibis Paint X is a popular and versatile drawing app downloaded more than 460 million times in total as a series, which provides over 47000 brushes, over 27000 materials, over 2100 fonts,84 filters, 46 screentones, 27 blending modes, recording drawing processes, stroke stabilization feature, various ruler features such as radial line rulers or symmetry rulers, clipping mask features.

*YouTube channel
Many tutorial videos on ibis Paint are uploaded to our YouTube channel.
Subscribe it!
https://youtube.com/ibisPaint

*Concept/Features
- A Highly functional and professional features surpassing that of desktop drawing apps.
- Smooth and comfortable drawing experience realized by OpenGL technology.
- Recording your drawing process as a video.
- SNS feature where you can learn drawing techniques from other users' drawing process videos.

*Feedback from users
We receive many good reputations from users.
- I could have never assumed that I can draw such a beautiful drawings on smartphones!
- Easiest to use among all drawing apps!
- I have learned how to draw digital drawings without Mac or PC!

*Features
ibis Paint has high functionality as a drawing app along with features of sharing drawing processes with other users.

[Brush Features]
- Smooth drawing at up to 120 fps.
- Over 47000 kinds of brushes including dip pens, felt tip pens, digital pens, air brushes, fan brushes, flat brushes, pencils, oil brushes, charcoal brushes, crayons and stamps.

[Layer Features]
- You can add layers as many as you need with no limit.
- Layer parameters that can be set to each layers individually such as layer opacity, alpha blending, adding, subtracting, and multiplying.
- A handy clipping feature for clipping images, etc.
- Various layer commands such as layer duplication, import from the photo library, horizontal inversion, vertical inversion, layer rotation, layer moving, and zooming in/out.
- A feature for setting layer names to distinguish different layers.

[Manga Features]
- Advanced text tool function featuring Vertical, Horizontal, Stroke, Font select, and Multiple text functions.

*About ibis Paint purchase plan
The following purchase plans are available for ibis Paint:
- ibis Paint X (free version)
- ibis Paint (paid version)
- Remove Ads Add-on
- Prime Membership (Monthly plan / Yearly plan)
There is no difference in features other than the presence or absence of advertisements for the paid version and the free version.
If you purchase the Remove Ads Add-on, the ads will not be displayed and there will be no difference from the paid version of ibis Paint.
In order to use more advanced functions, the following Prime Membership (Monthly plan / Yearly plan) contracts are required.

[Prime Membership]
A prime member can use the prime features. Only for the first time, a 7-day or 1-month free trial is available. Prime membership entitles you to the following features.
- 20GB of cloud storage capacity
- Vector tool(*1)
- Prime Materials
- Prime Canvas Papers
- Prime Fonts
- Tone Curve filter
- Gradation Map filter
- Levels Adjustment filter
- Prime Adjustment Layers
- Surrounding Fill・Surrounding Eraser
- AI Disturbance
- Artwork folder feature
- Import original brush patterns
- Remove watermark from videos
- No advertisements displayed
- Plus many other features exclusive to Prime Membership!
(*1) You can try it for free for up to 1 hour per day.
* After you become a Prime Membership with a free trial, renewal fee will be charged automatically unless you cancel your Prime Membership at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial period.
* We will add premium features in future, please look out for them.

*Questions and support
Questions and bug reports in reviews will not be responded to, so please contact ibis Paint support.
https://ssl.ibis.ne.jp/en/support/Entry?svid=25

*ibisPaint's terms of service
https://ibispaint.com/agreement.jsp

Transform your living space with DecAI™, where designing your dream home is as simple as snapping a photo by AI.

► AI Interior Design & Decor
Just upload an image of your room, choose the type of space and the style you want. Our advanced AI technology will analyze your room's dimensions and characteristics, then generate a stunning interior design plan catered to your taste. From modern chic to rustic warmth, our AI interior designer presents you with a visualization of furniture arrangements, color palettes, and decorative accents that bring your personal touch to life. 

► AI Garden Design
Upload a snapshot of your yard, patio or rooftop, and watch as our advanced AI crafts personalized garden designs in seconds—no green thumb needed. From tropical oases to cottage-core charm, our technology tailors layouts with seasonal blooms, winding pathways, and cozy seating zones, matching your style and space dimensions. Visualize drought-resistant plantings, modern hardscaping, or vibrant flower beds before breaking ground, and unlock endless possibilities for backyard makeovers, balcony retreats, or front-yard curb appeal. 

► AI Exterior Design & Renovation
Transform your home's exterior and garden with AI-powered design tools, visualize your dream space. Get rid of design constraints with a multitude of novel ideas for your home's exterior design. Simply upload a picture of your house, choose your preferred style, and the AI will provide you with a personalized design plan.

► Transform Any Item with Replace
Unlimited Creativity with Seamless Replacement – Tired of your current furniture or decorations? The Replace feature lets you erase unwanted items and input what you’d like to see instead, generating a new image to breathe new life into your home.


► Discover New Walls
Revamp your room's look with "New Walls." Swap textures and colors with ease, visualizing the perfect wall finish without lifting a paintbrush. Our AI ensures every suggestion aligns with your vision.

► Preview Your Flooring Choices
Why wait for the perfect flooring when you can see it instantly? Our "Instantly Install New Flooring" feature lets you preview a wide selection of flooring options, from hardwood to tile, right on your device.

► Explore Room Design Ideas
Looking for a little inspiration? "AI Interior Design" is your go-to source for a plethora of room design ideas.

AR Drawing - Sketches is perfect for anyone looking to improve their sketching or drawing skills. Downloaded by over 1.5 Million users all over the world, the app stands out for its simplicity and ease of use, providing a practical way to trace and recreate any image.

Whether you're an experienced artist aiming to sharpen your techniques or a beginner hoping to produce better drawings, this app has something for you.

AR Drawing - Sketches preserves the original outlines of your image and overlays them on your drawing surface, guiding your hand and making the tracing process much easier.

You can also access drawing lessons designed to help you grow step by step, track your progress through various milestones, and find inspiration from a curated selection of images and artwork.

Key Features:

- Image Projector with AR Anchor Tool: Overlay any image onto your drawing surface using your device’s camera and anchor it precisely with AR technology. This ensures image stability and helps guide your hand as you draw.
- Light Table: Turn your phone into a virtual light table to trace images directly from the screen—ideal for sketching on paper.
- Digital Drawing: Use intuitive sketch tools to draw directly on your device, perfect for quick concept art or practicing anywhere.
- Drawing Lessons: Learn and improve your drawing skills through lessons suitable for all skill levels.
- Progress Tracking: Set goals and unlock milestones to stay motivated and see how far you've come.
- Inspiration Hub: Explore curated content to spark your creativity and try new styles.

How to Get Started:

1. Upload a high-quality image or choose one from the gallery.
2. Adjust the image’s transparency and contrast to make it easier to trace.
3. Secure your phone above your paper using a tripod or even a cup.
4. Start drawing and create your own masterpiece.
